https://tmrev.io/movie/675394-Carlos' Birthday 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Carlos, from a juvenile prison, recalls the day of his eleventh birthday, when he was free to survive in a city of Central America. He was then leader of a gang of homeless boys, who spent their time stealing from tourists, sniffing glue, and dreaming of an official football But on his birthday he receives an assignment: to kill a man. Carlos' Birthday
